001package edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.model;
002
003import com.google.gson.annotations.Expose;
004import com.google.gson.annotations.SerializedName;
005import java.time.Instant;
006import java.util.Date;
007import java.util.LinkedList;
008import java.util.List;
009import java.util.Set;
010import java.util.stream.Collectors;
011
012public class Game {
013
014  @SerializedName("key")
015  @Expose(serialize = false, deserialize = true)
016  private final String id;
017
018  @Expose
019  private final String pool;
020
021  @Expose
022  private final int length;
023
024  @Expose(serialize = false, deserialize = true)
025  private final List<Guess> guesses;
026
027  @Expose(serialize = false, deserialize = true)
028  @SerializedName("created")
029  private final Date start;
030
031  public Game(String pool, int length) throws BadCodeLengthException, BadPoolException {
032    if (length <= 0) {
033      throw new BadCodeLengthException();
034    }
035    if (pool.isEmpty()) {
036      throw new BadPoolException();
037    }
038    this.pool = pool;
039    this.length = length;
040    id = null;
041    guesses = new LinkedList<>();
042    start = null;
043  }
044
045  public Guess validate(String content) throws BadGuessLengthException, CharacterNotInPoolException {
046    if (codePointLength(content) != length) {
047      throw new BadGuessLengthException();
048    }
049    Set<Integer> poolCodePoints = getCodePointSet(pool);
050    Set<Integer> contentCodePoints = getCodePointSet(content);
051    if (!poolCodePoints.containsAll(contentCodePoints)) {
052      throw new CharacterNotInPoolException();
053    }
054    return new Guess(content);
055  }
056
057  private Set<Integer> getCodePointSet(String src) {
058    return src
059        .codePoints()
060        .boxed()
061        .collect(Collectors.toSet());
062  }
063
064  public String getId() {
065    return id;
066  }
067
068  public String getPool() {
069    return pool;
070  }
071
072  public int getLength() {
073    return length;
074  }
075
076  public List<Guess> getGuesses() {
077    return guesses;
078  }
079
080  public Date getStart() {
081    return start;
082  }
083
084  public boolean isSolved() {
085    List<Guess> guesses = getGuesses();
086    return !guesses.isEmpty() && guesses.get(guesses.size()-1).getCorrect() == length;
087  }
088  private int codePointLength(String src) {
089    return (int) src
090        .codePoints()
091        .count();
092  }
093
094}
